'''install''' - Install a rock.

== Usage ==

:'''[[luarocks.wiki|luarocks]] install {''rock'' | ''name'' <nowiki>[</nowiki>''version''<nowiki>]</nowiki>}'''

Argument may be the name of a rock to be fetched from a server or the direct URL or filename of a rockspec. In case of more than one rock matching the request, the "install" command favors binary rocks.

== Example ==

 luarocks install luasocket
